content.content: 1. The Act applies to the following provinces and territories of Canada: Alberta British Columbia Manitoba New Brunswick Newfoundland Northwest Territories Nova Scotia Nunavut Prince Edward Island Saskatchewan Yukon Territory O. Reg. 322/92, s. 1; O. Reg. 298/99, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The Act applies to the following provinces and territories of Canada:

Alberta

British Columbia

Manitoba

New Brunswick

Newfoundland

Northwest Territories

Nova Scotia

Nunavut

Prince Edward Island

Saskatchewan

Yukon Territory

O. Reg. 322/92, s. 1; O. Reg. 298/99, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (revokes other Regulations).  O. Reg. 322/92, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (revokes other Regulations).  O. Reg. 322/92, s. 2.
